body: <u>External shading schedule <u><u>(<u>control keyword = <u><u><u>AnnualShadingSchedule</u></u></u>)</u></u></u></u>: Daysim uses an external shading file that detemrines the status of the dynamic shading systems at every hour in the year. The external shading profile should be a comma seperate file with a three line header and the format: month, day, hour, shading fraction [0,1] in each line. See sample file:[BlindsAlwaysClosed.csv](http://api.ning.com/files/Sh7zTInlQpt9C7U20q41O7NBKfFIVUzYahTl4knntFkDWySnf27RWuuKYKMUfnqIdNkK57oYL6kHeQuRX3VrfZqXjQ8CPTHt/BlindsAlwaysClosed.csv).
